oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Self-field-induced flux creep in yba2cu3o7-y thin-films
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, R
MALIK, SK
PAI, SP
APTE, PR
PINTO, R
VIJAYARAGHAVAN, R
KUMAR, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: critical currents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Self-field-induced flux creep has been studied in YBa2Cu3O7-y thin films under zero external magnetic field at various temperatures below T(c). The results are analyzed on the basis of Anderson-Kim flux creep model extended to include the self-fields. The variation of the pinning potential, U0, as a function of temperature is obtained.
